channel.title: Comments on: In One of those Rare “What Do YOU Think” Moments, What do YOU Think?

item.title: By: buttonmashing.com | AFK Gamer and collaborative blogging
item.dc:creator: buttonmashing.com | AFK Gamer and collaborative blogging
item.description: [...] those of us in video game blogging (actually, for anyone who loves gaming). You can read about it here, but the gist of it is: One weekend, a collaborative blog. Anyone that pre-registers can post. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] those of us in video game blogging (actually, for anyone who loves gaming). You can read about it here, but the gist of it is: One weekend, a collaborative blog. Anyone that pre-registers can post. […]

item.title: By: AFK Gamer and collaborative blogging at buttonmashing.com
item.dc:creator: AFK Gamer and collaborative blogging at buttonmashing.com
item.description: [...] Foton over at AFK Gamer is considering a really cool idea for those of us in video game blogging (actually, for anyone who loves gaming). You can read about it here, but the gist of it is: One weekend, a collaborative blog. Anyone that pre-registers can post. It's an orgy of gaming in whatever game you choose. The objective is ... a stream of conciousness on your gaming experiences for the weekend. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Foton over at AFK Gamer is considering a really cool idea for those of us in video game blogging (actually, for anyone who loves gaming). You can read about it here, but the gist of it is: One weekend, a collaborative blog. Anyone that pre-registers can post. It’s an orgy of gaming in whatever game you choose. The objective is … a stream of conciousness on your gaming experiences for the weekend. […]

item.title: By: A. Jacobson
item.dc:creator: A. Jacobson
item.description:
Sounds like a great experiment. If you're looking for volunteers, I'm willing to help out however I can.
(blogging games at http:rendergaming.blogspot.com)
item.content:encoded:
Sounds like a great experiment. If you’re looking for volunteers, I’m willing to help out however I can.

(blogging games at http:rendergaming.blogspot.com)

item.title: By: Foton of AFK Gamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFK Gamer
item.description: Gonna send out emails tomorrow to twist some arms and we'll put this on the stoop and see if the cat licks it up.
item.content:encoded: Gonna send out emails tomorrow to twist some arms and we’ll put this on the stoop and see if the cat licks it up.

item.title: By: Cabbage
item.dc:creator: Cabbage
item.content:encoded:
Gamers of the world, UNITE!

Read an interesting post over at AFKGamer.

File this under the category “nothing ventured, nothing gained.”

One weekend, a collaborative blog. Anyone that pre-registers can post. It’s an orgy of gaming in whatever game you choose. The objec…

item.title: By: Cabbage
item.dc:creator: Cabbage
item.description:
I'd be willing to contribute. Heck, I'd love to see this idea posted very soon.
Next weekend to be exact. (March 18th)
Anyway, keep us updated. I'll give this a trackback (assuming I've learned to use them correctly).
item.content:encoded:
I’d be willing to contribute. Heck, I’d love to see this idea posted very soon.

Next weekend to be exact. (March 18th)

Anyway, keep us updated. I’ll give this a trackback (assuming I’ve learned to use them correctly).

item.title: By: Foton of AFK Gamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFK Gamer
item.description:
Stephen: I think insiders could offer a unique perspective that would be valuable. Even the boastful kind of industry dudes. (I kid! I kid!)
In the next two days, I'll send an email to a few of the commenters here that expressed an interest in helping admin/organize this cluster ... blog, soliciting opinions and suggestions.
If you want to follow this project and have some suggestions, blah blah, shoot me an email: Foton(at)afkgamer.com. I'm at the "twisting arms" stage, so anyone else that wants to climb aboard, send an email.
item.content:encoded:
Stephen: I think insiders could offer a unique perspective that would be valuable. Even the boastful kind of industry dudes. (I kid! I kid!)

In the next two days, I’ll send an email to a few of the commenters here that expressed an interest in helping admin/organize this cluster … blog, soliciting opinions and suggestions.

If you want to follow this project and have some suggestions, blah blah, shoot me an email: Foton(at)afkgamer.com. I’m at the “twisting arms” stage, so anyone else that wants to climb aboard, send an email.

item.title: By: Stephen
item.dc:creator: Stephen
item.description:
I'd really like to be in, but I'm an MMO industry insider, and I'm not sure how you'd feel about that. (Not boasting, it's just the truth.)
I read this blog religiously though, and have blogged on and off for about four - shit, five years - just never about gaming. Been thinking about it recently just because I'm playing so many games.
Anyway, offer's there. I think ongoing it could be an interesting blog if you get enough writers who can write in an interesting way.
item.content:encoded:
I’d really like to be in, but I’m an MMO industry insider, and I’m not sure how you’d feel about that. (Not boasting, it’s just the truth.)

I read this blog religiously though, and have blogged on and off for about four – shit, five years – just never about gaming. Been thinking about it recently just because I’m playing so many games.

Anyway, offer’s there. I think ongoing it could be an interesting blog if you get enough writers who can write in an interesting way.

item.title: By: Byron Ellacott
item.dc:creator: Byron Ellacott
item.description: I've never been afraid to publicly show my ineptitude. Hell, could make a theme of it: how many Alliance innkeepers can I kill in one weekend?
item.content:encoded: I’ve never been afraid to publicly show my ineptitude. Hell, could make a theme of it: how many Alliance innkeepers can I kill in one weekend?
